properties.Name: NoteClass
properties.Description:
The individual class of notes that comprise a complete issue.

Ex:

Shinsei Funding Three
Amount: 짜40bn
Rating: AAA/AAA/AAA
Issue price: 100.00

Class 2002-3 notes: 짜15.5bn
Legal maturity: April 25, 2007
Expected maturity: April 25, 2005
Coupon: 0.59%
Spread at re-offer: three month
Libor plus 35bp

Class 2002-4 notes: 짜10.5bn
Legal maturity: April 25, 2009
Expected maturity: April 25, 2007
Coupon: 1.055%
Spread at re-offer: three month
Libor plus 55bp

Class 2002-4 notes: 짜14bn
Legal maturity: April 25, 2009
Expected maturity: April 25, 2007
Coupon: three month Libor plus
55bp

Launched: Thursday June 20
Lead mgr: Nomura (books),
Shinsei Securities
Secured on: loans to Japanese
corporates originated by Shinsei
Bank

Columns.Name: AssetBackedSecurityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: NoteClassId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Asset

Columns.Name: NoteClassName
Columns.Description:
The name of the Note Class.

Ex:
Class 2002-3 Notes:  15.5Bn Yen

Columns.Name: NoteClassDescription
Columns.Description: A description of the associated Note Class.

Columns.Name: NotesIssuedAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of asset backed security notes issued.

Columns.Name: NotesIssuePriceAmount
Columns.Description: The price of the issued notes.

Columns.Name: NotesLegalMaturityDate
Columns.Description: The legal maturity of the notes.

Columns.Name: NotesExpectedMaturityDate
Columns.Description: The expected maturity date of the notes.

Columns.Name: NotesCouponPercentage
Columns.Description: The percentage provided by the coupons of the notes.

Columns.Name: NotesSpreadAtReOfferStatement
Columns.Description:
The spread at re-offer of the ABS notes.

Ex:

Three month LIBOR plus 35 bp

Columns.Name: NotesSecuredOnAssetsStatement
Columns.Description:
A statement describing the underlying secured assets of the ABS notes.

Ex:

-  Secured on: loans to Japanese corporates originated by Shinsei Bank

-  Secured on: UK commercial mortgages originated by Northern Rock

-  Secured on: a secured loan to Home Technology Finance Ltd, a division of boxclever, backed by consumer and rental contracts originated by boxclever

Columns.Name: NotesCallOptionStatement
Columns.Description:
A statement describing any call options associated with the ABS notes.

Ex:

Call option: June 27, 2009 when coupons step up

Columns.Name: NotesAverageLife
Columns.Description: The average life to maturity of the associated Asset Backed Security Note Class.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.
